thread.section_title: Hotel Astoria - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great budget hotel
thread.title_full: Great budget hotel - Review of Hotel Astoria - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ejay16
title: Great budget hotel
text: This was a great place with great amenities! Every staff member was very helpful and nice, especially Tej who helped with the breakfast area. The room was simple, but clean and came with everything needed (and had a great view). The location was great and no more than a 2 minute walk to the Rome metro station. It was a bit farther from the center of Paris, but the metro is so easy to use that it didn't matter to us. Overall a good place to stay with a good price!
